# Celestial Guidance
## Scripture
> "The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands." - Psalm 19:1

## Reflection
As we gaze up at the night sky, we are reminded of the vastness and majesty of God's creation. The stars, planets, and galaxies all proclaim the glory of our Creator. Just as the position of the constellations can guide us in navigation, God's word can guide us through the journey of life. As we navigate the challenges and uncertainties of our daily lives, let us look to the celestial bodies as a reminder of God's presence and guidance. The same God who created the intricate patterns of the stars and planets is the same God who knows our every thought and cares for our every need.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, we are in awe of your creation and the vastness of the universe. Help us to look to the night sky as a reminder of your guidance and presence in our lives. As we navigate the challenges of life, give us the wisdom and faith to trust in your sovereignty. May we be guided by your word and may our hearts be filled with wonder and praise for your creation. Amen.
